2000: Usually, when girls are around 11 to 14, their bodies begin to change as the puberty* starts.
3000: *Puberty: the time when the body begins to develop and change as you move from a child to adult.
4400: One of those changes are having a period.
5200: During the period, the blood comes out of your body for a few days (around 3-7 days). So, you might be scared of it.
